channel.title: CVE Feed for MiCODUS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MiCODUS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2141|2024-09-16T22:40:28.132Z -- micodus -- mv720
item.description: SMS-based GPS commands can be executed by MiCODUS MV720 GPS tracker without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2022-34150|2024-09-16T22:40:23.174Z -- micodus -- mv720
item.description: The main MiCODUS MV720 GPS tracker web server has an authenticated insecure direct object reference vulnerability on endpoint and parameter device IDs, which accept arbitrary device IDs without further verification.
